title: Samsungâ€™s flagship Galaxy Tab S8 series tablets also throttle performance in some apps and games
content:
Samsung recently started rolling out a fresh software update for the Galaxy S22 series. The update addresses the performance throttling issue related to the pre-installed Game Optimization Service (GOS) app. It also introduces a new “Game Performance Management Mode” in the Game Booster to improve CPU/GPU performance. While Samsung is yet to release a similar

The post Samsung’s flagship Galaxy Tab S8 series tablets also throttle performance in some apps and games appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung's flagship Galaxy Tab S8 series tablets also throttle performance in some apps and games. Read on to learn more about the issue.
